parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Item at which to get the radius

title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.GetRadius
description: Gets the radius at the specified fillet/chamfer item.

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Item at which to get the radius

returns: Radius of the symmetric fillet at PFilletItem; Distance 1 radius of the asymmetric fillet/chamfer
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::GetFilletItemAtIndex
to get the pointer with which to specify PFilletItem.
Call
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::GetDistance
to get the Distance 2 radius of the asymmetric fillet/chamfer.
